name: Ring Race (1/10) VARIETY MEGAJAM 2020
description:
RING RACE (1/10) VARIETY MEGAJAM 2020

This is a simple and short race mini game where you have to complete 3 laps. Each lap you will face your own ghosts that will repeat your previous movements. Avoid hitting them and run as fast as you can!

(This game was made for the "Variety Megajam 2020" in 3 days. I used the inspiration image from here)

<Controls>
- < and > | Left and Right Arrow Keys: turn right and left
- ^  Up Arrow Key: use boost (available 1 time per game)

(You can also change the color of the car by pressing 'M')
